name: 5 Days Island
description:
You are alone in the middle of the Ocean after your plane crashed, hopefully you end up in an Island.

Alone,  you need to think and use well the things you get  to Survive..

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Drop actual item: Q

Pick up an item / Interact with Objects: E

Shift: Run

Open Crafting menu: Y

Left Click: Attack if you have a weapon

Right Click: Consumes the item you are holding, if it is consumable

Mouse whell: Changes the item you whant to use (there are only 2 inventory slots)

How to play:

In the island there are lots of items dropped in the ground,  You can get them pressing

"E", this button also works to interact with others objects, for example using  E  with a stick near fire will  keep the fire on, avoiding it to fade away.

For creating fire use Flint with others flints in the ground until you get fire.

With fire you can put Dead animals and cook them, cooked animals restore more Hunger points rather than raw food.

The same with purified water.

Remember use Bottles in the water to Refill them.

For doing most of things in the game you are gonna need an Axe,

craft it in the Craft Menu with Y, just click on the image from what you want to craft.
